name: Tech Demo (A claymation FPS)
description:
* Claymation Monsters

* Gonzo Weapons

* Each level is basically a different genre.

* Arrow Keys move around-Z-X-C-G/toggle/shoot/opendoor.

*16 bit style music!

Made with Raycasting Game Maker 4.

- Screenshots have been enhanced for pictorial quality, but all graphics are in-game.
